name: Leila Demian
text: This was the best Little Ceasars pizza i have had in a while. Usually i don't expect much for the price, but the dough was fluffy and they put plenty of sauce and toppings. Not bad at all.

text: I think the pizza is very good for the cost. Their 3 meat is my families new favorite.  I love pizza and there are better pizzas out there... but not as quick and not as cheap.
